thread.title: BJP’s Turn Now: Shiv Sena Insults PM Modi, BJP Leaders On Its Poster
thread.title_full: BJP’s Turn Now: Shiv Sena Insults PM Modi, BJP Leaders On Its Poster

author: Tehelka Web Desk
title: BJP’s Turn Now: Shiv Sena Insults PM Modi, BJP Leaders On Its Poster
text:
Comment After launching a series of attacks, including the recent BCCI office, Shiv Sena has now aimed at its ally BJP by displaying huge posters with picture of Prime Minister Narendra Modi and BJP leaders bowing before the late Shiv Sena chief Bal Thackeray. The lines accompanying the photo say: “(Have you) forgotten the days when your (now) proud necks bowed on the feet of late Balasaheb?”, reads the lines accompanying the poster. Reacting to the controversial posters, Sena leader Rajendra Raut said, “We only put up posters to remember our old days, it is not to disrespect any political leader.” 
“Today everyone is targeting Shiv Sena , Sainiks feel there should no alliance but I leave that decision to the leadership,” he added. */
